posts.post_content:
Prices are PayPal net to me / no-fee method.
Shipping included. Continental US only.
Offers welcome, but "I'll take it" cancels all pending negotiation.
Payment due within 24 hours, or card goes to the next buyer.
Please PM email [url]trae@t206.org[/url] - first come first served.
Thank you for looking.

SOLD

  * Bender No Trees SC460 F25 VG Diamond Cut SOLD

  * Bresnahan Batting EPDG Trimmed SOLD

  * Clarke Batting P150 VG-EX SOLD

  * Cobb Bat On SC150 F25 trimmed back damage SOLD [URL="https://www.t206.org/misc/jul-21-sale/Cobb-small.png"]picture 1[/URL] [URL="https://www.t206.org/misc/jul-21-sale/Cobb.jpg"]picture 2[/URL] [URL="https://www.t206.org/misc/jul-21-sale/Cobb-back.jpg"]picture 3[/URL]

  * Duffy P460 F25 GD creased SOLD

  * Flick P150 PR pinhole SOLD

  * Johnson Chest SC460 F42 trimmed? (formerly SGC A, but it measures) SOLD

  * King SL P350 GD chipping SOLD

  * Tinker Portrait P150 trimmed SOLD

  * Waddell Portrait P350 GD (formerly PSA 2 - cracked out) scrapbook glue SOLD [URL="https://www.t206.org/misc/jul-21-sale/Waddell.JPG"]picture 1[/URL] [URL="https://www.t206.org/misc/jul-21-sale/Waddell-Back.JPG"]picture 2[/URL]

  * Willis Batting PB trimmed creased SOLD

Only Cobb and Waddell are left. Offers welcome. Thank you.
I'm open to trading Cobb and/or Waddell for sharp SL'ers that I need too. Please let me know if you've got anything to offer.
Bump for price drops on Cobb and Waddell.
